title: The Making of the Worlds Best Cardamom – Emperor Spices Cardamom
description: There is a lot that goes into making the world’s best cardamom. It all begins with where it is grown. Kerala received the GI tag of Alleppey Green Cardamom. A geographical indication (GI) is a name or sign used on certain products which corresponds to a specific geographical location or origin (e.g., a town, country)
